item.title: Twitter Updates for 2010-05-30
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• I'm at BLT Prime (111 E 22nd St, btw Park Ave & Lexington, New York) w/ 3 others. #
  • I'm at Stumptown Coffee Roasters (Ace Hotel) (18 West 29th Street, btw Broadway & 5th Ave, New York). #
  • I'm at Bronx Zoo (2300 Southern Boulevard, Bronx) w/ 7 others. #
  • Rabbit @ Bronx Zoo #
